english.segment1: This is our nation, this is our land, This is our future, this is our hope. A land of reaping, a land of harvest, This is our land, this is our home.
english.segment2: This is the Great Southland of the Holy Spirit, A land of red dust plains and summer rains, To this sun-burnt land we will see a flood, And to this Great Southland His Spirit comes.
english.segment3: This is our nation, this is our land, This is our future, this is our hope. A land of reaping, a land of harvest, This is our land, this is our home.
english.segment4: This is the Great Southland of the Holy Spirit, A land of red dust plains and summer rains, To this sun-burnt land we will see a flood, And to this Great Southland His Spirit comes.
english.segment5: This is our nation, this is our land, This land of plenty, this land of hope. The richest harvest is in her peoples, We see revival, His Spirit comes.
english.segment6: This is the Great Southland of the Holy Spirit, A land of red dust plains and summer rains, To this sun-burnt land we will see a flood, And to this Great Southland His Spirit comes.
english.segment7: This is our nation, this is our land, This lucky country, of dreams gone dry, And to these people we see a harvest, And to this land, revival comes.
english.segment8: This is the Great Southland of the Holy Spirit, A land of red dust plains and summer rains, To this sun-burnt land we will see a flood, And to this Great Southland His Spirit comes.
